DataElement.preferredName: Person Prior Exposure Peptide Receptor Radionuclide Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Applicable Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating a patient meets the eligibility criteria for participation in a clinical trial regarding prior exposure to PRRT.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Prior Exposure Peptide Receptor Radionuclide Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Earlier in time or order._The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience._Treatment with a radioactive substance that is linked to a peptide receptor so that it will attach to a specific cell type when injected into the body. It is currently being used to treat neuroendocrine tumors, using octreotide as the targeting peptide._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Prior Exposure Peptide Receptor Radionuclide Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.:Treatment with a radioactive substance that is linked to a peptide receptor so that it will attach to a specific cell type when injected into the body. It is currently being used to treat neuroendocrine tumors, using octreotide as the targeting peptide.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

Treatment with a radioactive substance that is linked to a peptide receptor so that it will attach to a specific cell type when injected into the body. It is currently being used to treat neuroendocrine tumors, using octreotide as the targeting peptide.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient has not had prior exp
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has not had prior exposure to peptide receptor radionuclide therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior systemic exposure to peptide receptor radionuclide therapy (PRRT-based therapies)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has received 3 or 4 cycles of PRRT within a 52-week period.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been previously exposed to peptide receptor radionuclide therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_02
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has received 3 or 4 cycles of PRRT or a cumulative exposure of 22,200 MBq (600mCi) or 29,600 MBq (800 mCi) within a 52-week period?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 1/20/23 added AQT for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl; 12/21/22 added AQT and alt OID, CCTG for ticket number CADSR0001818 cjl;
